CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( State_Brand_Name__c, "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( State_Brand_Name__c , "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( State_Your_Name__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( State_Your_Name__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Obtain_Customer_Name__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Obtain_Customer_Name__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Offer_Ask__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Offer_Ask__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) ) / 4
CustomField.label: Greeting Total %
